db package¶

Submodules¶

db.client_db_config module¶

class db.client_db_config.ClientDB(name)¶

Bases: object

A wrapper class for working with the client database. Uses SQLite database, implemented with SQLAlchemy ORM and uses declarative approach.

class Base(**kwargs)¶

Bases: object

The base class of the class hierarchy.

When called, it accepts no arguments and returns a new featureless instance that has no instance attributes and cannot be given any.

metadata = MetaData()¶
registry = <sqlalchemy.orm.decl_api.registry object>¶

add_contact(contact)¶

A method that adds a contact to the database.

add_users(users_list)¶

A method that populates the table of known users.

check_contact(contact)¶

A method that checks if a contact exists.

check_user(user)¶

A method that checks if the user exists.

contacts_clear()¶

A method that clears a table with a list of contacts.

del_contact(contact)¶

A method that removes a specific contact.

get_contacts()¶

A method that returns a list of all contacts.

get_history(contact)¶

A method that returns the history of messages with a specific user.

get_users()¶

A method that returns a list of all known users.

save_message(contact, direction, message)¶

A method that saves the message to the database.

db.server_db_config module¶

class db.server_db_config.ServerDB(path)¶

Bases: object

A wrapper class for working with the server database. It uses a SQLite database, implemented with SQLAlchemy ORM and uses a declarative approach.

class UsersHistory(user)¶

Bases: Base

Displaying the activity history table.

accepted¶
id¶

user¶
active_users_list()¶

A method returning a list of active users.

add_contact(user, contact)¶

A method for adding a contact for the user.

add_user(name, pswd_hash)¶

User registration method. Accepts a name and password hash, creates an entry in the statistics table.

check_user(name)¶

A method that checks for the existence of a user.

get_contacts(username)¶

A method that returns a list of the user’s contacts.

get_hash(name)¶

A method to get the hash of the user’s password.

get_public_key(name)¶

A method for getting the user’s public key.

login_history(username=None)¶

A method that returns the login history.

message_history()¶

A method that returns message statistics.

process_message(sender, recipient)¶

A method that writes the fact of message transmission to the statistics table.

remove_contact(user, contact)¶

A method for deleting a user’s contact.

remove_user(name)¶

A method that removes a user from the database.

user_login(username, ip, port, key)¶

The method that executed when the user logs in, writes the login fact to the database. Updates the user’s public key when it changes.

user_logout(username)¶

A method fixing user disconnections.

users_list()¶

A method that returns a list of known users with last login time.
